name: Human User
description: Represents an individual user account monitored for access, activity, or authentication metrics.

name: Role
description: Logical grouping defining permissions and access control policies.

name: Application Service
description: A business or technical application being monitored for health, availability, and performance.

name: Automation Task
description: A scheduled or triggered operational workflow or script.

name: Edge Device
description: Devices deployed at branch or remote locations (e.g., SD-WAN, IoT gateways).

name: Pattern / Template
description: Monitoring template or policy applied across multiple devices.

name: System Configuration
description: Represents configuration objects and compliance state.

name: Alert Rule
description: Monitoring rule that generates alerts based on thresholds or conditions.

name: Incident / Event
description: A triggered event requiring review or remediation.

name: Audit Record
description: Logged system or user activity for compliance tracking.

name: Meeting / Collaboration Resource
description: Unified communication or conferencing service endpoints.

name: Education / LMS Service
description: Learning or training platform service instance.

name: Metric / Measurement
description: Quantitative monitored metric (CPU, memory, latency, etc.).

name: Worker Node / Agent
description: Monitoring agent or worker service collecting telemetry.

name: Process / Runtime
description: Running process or container instance.

name: User Session
description: Active login or application session instance.

name: Policy Decision
description: Security or routing policy evaluation object.

name: US Region / Geographic Zone
description: Logical region used for location-based monitoring.

name: Historical Record
description: Archived performance or event data.

name: Time Period / Reporting Year
description: Logical reporting interval object.

name: Device Type
description: Category classification (router, switch, firewall, server).

name: Change / Deployment
description: Infrastructure change event or deployment object.

name: Discovery Job
description: Automated discovery scan task.

name: Data Source
description: External telemetry source (SNMP, API, Syslog, etc.).

name: Infrastructure Component
description: Core structural component (VM, server, storage, network).

name: Capacity / Growth Metric
description: Trend-based capacity planning metric.

name: Partner / External Integration
description: Third-party integrated service.

name: Compliance Framework
description: Security or regulatory compliance object (e.g., policy mapping).

name: Marketplace / Catalog Item
description: Service catalog or marketplace offering.

name: Case / Ticket
description: ITSM incident or support ticket object.

name: Experience Metric
description: End-user experience monitoring metric (RUM/Synthetic).

name: Security Defense Control
description: Firewall, IDS, IPS, endpoint protection system.

name: Wearable / IoT Device
description: IoT endpoints and smart devices.

name: Unmanaged Device
description: Device detected but not actively monitored.

name: Network Path / Route
description: Logical network route or traffic path.

name: Configuration Baseline
description: Standard configuration profile for compliance validation.

name: School / Campus Network
description: Logical grouping for campus-level monitoring.

name: Problem Record
description: Root cause or problem management object.

name: Support Contract
description: SLA or vendor support agreement object.

name: Auxiliary Resource
description: Supporting resource linked to primary infrastructure.

name: Short-Term Metric
description: Real-time or short retention metric.

name: Aggregation Group
description: Logical grouping of multiple monitored devices.

name: Billing Object
description: Cost tracking and financial reporting entity.

name: Risk / Concern Item
description: Identified operational risk.

name: Always-On Service
description: High-availability critical service component.

name: Secondary Resource
description: Redundant or backup component.

name: Community / Shared Service
description: Shared infrastructure service instance.

name: Participant Node
description: Device participating in a cluster or distributed system.

name: Impact / Affect Analysis
description: Object representing service impact relationships.

name: Regional Zone / South
description: Geographic grouping for southern region assets.
